scripts.generate-resume-pdf: node scripts/generatePDF.js static/resume/index.html public/resume/resume.pdf "Don Alfons's Resume"
scripts.build: hugo --baseURL https://itsdonnix.github.io --minify && pnpm run build-css && pnpm run generate-resume-pdf
scripts.build:test: hugo --minify && pnpm run build-css && pnpm run generate-resume-pdf
scripts.dev: nodemon -e 'html, css, js, md toml' -i public -x 'clear; hugo; postcss assets/css/main.css -o public/css/main.min.css'
